metadata.name: GM, I plead
metadata.description:
"gm. please, gm"

Make-up art on Hugo Faz, photography and digital illustration. 4500x4500 jpeg.

Image to be licensed as CC0 (public domain, free to use by anyone) upon primary acquisition.

Metaphysical Portraits is my collection of mixed media artistic creations that express my thoughts and feelings. They are made in collaboration with other artists who serve as the models and canvas for each creation, and are minted right after finished. - Steven B

This NFT was minted with gas sponsorship by Casa NUA, an important initiative onboarding and incubating to the NFT art space amazing non-english-speaking artists from the developing world. All their proceeds are reverted back to incubating more underrepresented artists to kickstarting their NFT careers.
